path.style: fill: none; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: 1, 1; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;

opacity: 0.5; fill: none; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.25; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;
fill: none; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.25; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

opacity: 1; fill: none; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.25; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;
